channel.title: "Night Watch" and "Day Watch" THESE BEAT TWILIGHT ANYDAY!
channel.description:
I've only seen Night Watch but Day Watch looks fucking awesome!
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FYF5EhoIsA8]Night Watch[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h0dpP57TCKc&feature=related]Day Watch[/url]
I'm not sure about Day Watch but Night Watch is in Russian but has English subtitles.
Both movies are epic.
Well what I've seen from Night Watch, is that there are two sides, Light and Dark. On number one I forgot his name but the main character finds out that his son is a other, the son he never knew. He was to tell his son to choose between the light or dark, in the end the main character wasn't there for his son (he lies) and Yugo goes to the dark side. But then I think on Day Watch Yugo goes rogue. Oh yeah the dark side are vampires and both sides can go invisible, well into a different dimension but still in the same world, that is called The Gloom.

item.title: "Night Watch" and "Day Watch" THESE BEAT TWILIGHT ANYDAY!
